scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @soundx/ws run build && pnpm --filter @soundx/services run build && pnpm --filter @soundx/utils run build && pnpm --filter @soundx/db run generate && concurrently "pnpm --filter api run start:dev" "pnpm --filter sound-x run dev"
scripts.build:desktop:clean: taskkill /f /im AudioDock.exe 2>nul || true && cd apps/desktop && powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force release -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && npm run build:win
scripts.setup:electron: npm config set electron_mirror https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/ && npm config set electron_custom_dir "{{ version }}"
scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter @soundx/ws run build && pnpm --filter @soundx/services run build && pnpm --filter @soundx/utils run build
